author: Brian Wang
title: Coronavirus Deaths Undercounted Because of Scale of Italian Disaster
description: Giorgio Gori, mayor of Bergamo, told NBC News on Monday that the total deaths in Bergamo are three to four times higher than during an average year, signaling that the virus is killing many more... [[ This is a content summary only. Visit my website for full …
content:
Giorgio Gori, mayor of Bergamo, told NBC News on Monday that the total deaths in Bergamo are three to four times higher than during an average year, signaling that the virus is killing many more people than medical authorities have reported.
Many people are … [+2298 chars]
